content.text: not much, just finished baking some bagels
Just some plain bagels, but I like to put cream cheese and lox on them
oooo sounds delish! I like cream cheese too, but I don't think I've ever had lox
Lox is smoked salmon, it's really good! You should try it sometime
I will! I like salmon, so I'm sure I'll like lox
I'm glad! Maybe I'll make you some bagels with lox next time I bake
That would be awesome! I love when people make me food
I'm glad to hear that! I love to cook, so I'm always happy to make people food
Well I'm sure it's delicious, because you seem like a great cook
Thank you! That's very kind of you to say
You're welcome! I'm just being hones
